Have a video recording from your phone that you'd like to turn into a ringtone?
Want to make an alarm-tone from when the bass drops in some song on your phone?

With editmp3.online you can edit and convert and video or audio file to mp3 and do cropping tasks.

With this extension you can do tasks such as:
